nodes.text: The Naval Subcommittee was a political subcommittee in the Senate of the Galactic Republic active during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. It was tasked with overlooking matters concerning the Republic Navy and had oversight over the Department of Naval Procurement, which was responsible for obtaining starships, supplies, and new technology.

The Procurement Panel was part of the subcommittee, which accepted contracts from a number of corporations. Such corporations included Sienar Fleet Systems, Kuat Drive Yards, Corellian Engineering Corporation, Rendili StarDrive, Cygnus Spaceworks, Incom Corporation, and Sublights Products Corporation. Each had designs they hoped to sell to the Republic.

The Naval Subcommittee was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The Naval Subcommittee originally appeared in the Star Wars Legends Admiral Jerjerrod's Testimony, a short story within the 1993 West End Games Imperial Sourcebook for their Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
